mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NAME AS memberName , MEMBER_AGE AS memberAge , MEMBER_EDUC AS memberEduc , MEMBER_TEL AS memberTel , LEADER_FLG AS leaderFlg , MEMBER_ID AS memberId FROM SL_EC_TEAM WHERE SL_CODE=#{filterMap.slCode} AND (DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg} OR ISNULL(DEL_FLG))
SELECT EP_ID AS epId FROM SL_SELLER WHERE SL_CODE=#{filterMap.slCode}
